snippet: The St. Louis County Police Department will take responsibility for maintaining order as demonstrators continue to gather nightly to demand justice for Michael Brown and the policeman who shot him.
abstract: St Louis County Police Department steps in to take responsibility for maintaining order in Ferguson, Mo, as demonstrators continue to gather nightly to demand justice for police killing of Michael Brown; shift means that county force, a significantly larger and more sophisticated department, will handle all arrests and charges.
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis County Police Department will take responsibility for maintaining order as demonstrators continue to gather nightly to demand justice for Michael Brown and the policeman who shot him.

headline.main: As Protests Persist, Ferguson Transfers Security to County
headline.print_headline: As Protests Persist, Ferguson Transfers Security to County
